content: lift strand between sts from back knit through front loop p purl pm place marker psso pass over on the right needle pass the 1st over the 2nd st repeat/s repeat/s rm remove marker rs right side slm slip marker sm stitch marker st/s stitch/es tutorial videos crochet cast on https //youtu be/llmi-sqlte0 knitting cables without a cable needle https //youtu be/92-uvcwduhm #rockycliffscowl © gretha mensen #grethamensen 3
